data.event: Dallas was officially incorporated in 1863 and is the oldest incorporated town in Gaston County.

event.title: served as the original county seat for Gaston County from 1846

data.event: It served as the original county seat for Gaston County from 1846 until 1911.
The old Gaston County courthouse, renovated in 1868 after a fire, still stands in the main square of the town and formerly served as the headquarters of the Dallas Police Department.
